Onyeàmà Bonjisi (a mụrụ n'afọ 1975) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Mudzi, Mutoko, ọ bụ nwa nke abụọ n'ime ezinụlọ ya, ma tolite na Domboshoava, Chinamhora
N'ebe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị tupu ọ kwaga Mabvuku, na mpụga Harare, wee gụchaa akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya
Ọ malitere ịkpụ ihe n'afọ 1992, ya na nwanne ya nwoke Lameck na Nicholas Mukomberanwa malitere I rụkọ ọrụ; nwanne ya nwoke Tafunga bụkwa onye na-ese ihe

N'afọ 1997, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'onwe ya, ma kemgbe ahụ ọ gara ọmụmụ ihe na United States na Switzerland.
O so na ụfọdụ n'ime ndị na-ese ihe ugbu a nke AVAC Arts (www.avacarts.com) na-anọchite anya ma na-ere ahịa ugbu a, ụlọ ngosi n'ịntanetị na-akwalite ọtụtụ ndị na-ese nkume na Zimbabwe.
